summary: Software Engineer focused on secure, resilient payment systems and scalable web applications. I build reliable products with modern JavaScript, React, and backend engineering best practices.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Build and maintain instant payments services supporting FedNow and RTP message flows, with a focus on reliability, compliance, and performance. Deliver production features through sprint planning, automated testing, and controlled deployments while partnering with cross-functional teams on risk controls, resiliency, and platform modernization.

experience.title: Software Development Consultant
experience.description: Developed and debugged Datespot web applications utilizing resources including Asana and DigitalOcean, which making it easier to collect data. Atom tool was used to refactor the Datespot web application web-friendly and easier to use.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Victorise web applications were developed and debugged utilizing resources including AngularJS and Ionic framework as well as utilizing React-Native to develop and debug the Victorise mobile application. Resources including SourceTree, Bitbucket, Trello, and Robo3t were used in this project to communicate with the team members to find the solutions for this application. Ionic was used to refactor the codes and develop a web-friendly website to make the Victorise web application effective.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: REU Manager web application was actively developed utilizing RSpec to provide 100% testing coverage and SCRUM development practices was used to make appropriate adjustments based on the team hypothesis and experience. Errors in the documents and manuals was adjusted for the new user to be able to understand the program.

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experience.description: Learn Academy an intensive full-time coding boot camp that teaches skills from coding itself, to pair programming. The boot camp solidifies interpersonal communication and working as a pair, a mob, or even alone. •	Completed over 480 hours of direct coding in an intensive web development boot camp. •	Gained proficiency in JavaScript, Ruby, and React while creating full-stack programs.  •	Employed effective communication and cooperation over pair and mob programming assignments.

certifications.name: Career Essentials in Software Development by Microsoft and LinkedIn

honors.title: Scholarships
honors.description: Member of National Society of Colligate Scholarship Lucille R Jennin Scholarship M &M Forman Scholarship NTID Science and Engineer Scholarship Louis Wolk Scholarship

honors.title: Team Spotlight Award
honors.description: RTPAY Rewrite initiative was started early this year where the whole team was involved in rewriting the legacy Instant Payments platform from Oracle Service Bus to open technology tech stack of Spring Boot and Reactive programming. Some of the key advantages of this initiative are common code base across different networks, high throughput, quicker response times and overall, extremely scalable, and maintainable platform. The new platform supports 400 TPS for throughput processing making it one of the first few applications in PTCT To achieve that. For all the hard work and long hours spent by you in making this project a success.

caseStudies.title: Improved web app loading and responsiveness
caseStudies.problem: Initial load and navigation felt slow on 3G connections and mid-tier devices.
caseStudies.approach: Audited bundle, reduced unused JS/CSS, added image optimization/lazy loading, deferred non-critical scripts, and tuned caching.
caseStudies.impact: Perceived performance improved with faster first paint and smoother interactions. Replace with your exact metrics.
